Identification.LongTitle: Canadian Transportation Agency Designated Provisions Regulations

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport, pursuant to subsection 36(1) of the Canada Transportation Acta, hereby approves the Canadian Transportation Agency Designated Provisions Regulations, made by the Canadian Transportation Agency.

Section.Text: In these Regulations, Act means the Canada Transportation Act.
The provisions, requirements and conditions set out in column 1 of the schedule are designated for the purposes of subsections 177(1) and (1.1) of the Act.
The maximum amount payable in respect of a contravention of a provision, requirement or condition set out in column 1 of the schedule is the amount

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a corporation, set out in column 2; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of an individual, set out in column 3.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on the day on which they are registered.

entry.XRefExternal: Personnel Training for the Assistance of Persons with Disabilities Regulations
